lenders.name: Freyja
lenders.loan_because: it's a great idea!  It's smart, helping people build businesses that will sustain them and their families and contribute to a healthy global economy.

lenders.name: cecilia
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great idea!

lenders.name: Jennie
lenders.loan_because: We all need to think globally.
lenders.occupational_info: I help women deliver healthy babies.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: because I want to help others accomplish their goals.

lenders.name: Raymond
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to support themselves & their family.  I would like to help others because that's what Jesus would do.

lenders.name: Amory
lenders.loan_because: I care about people and i have visited many third world countries and it has really moved me to lend to them and make thier lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: The work of helping people, to any extent, is the greatest gift anyone can give. It can only be repaid by the warmth and contentment you feel from doing good.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a real estate brokerage, helping different departments work together efficiently.

lenders.name: ADJ
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves to get a chance in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I find people in IT the job they want.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of individuals

lenders.name: John & Jackie
lenders.loan_because: We have always been impressed by the impact that microlending can have. So when Kiva came along and gave us the opportunity to participate it seemed too good to be true.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I care and we're here to help each other
lenders.occupational_info: When we are all part of the solution, there won't be a problem.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: It's a good feeling to be able to help others

lenders.name: Audrey
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to come up with money when you are just starting out because not everyone has a good standing with finances.  I want to help others out there become financially independant to where they can afford to help someone else in the same situations as what they were once in.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with all sorts of different families that want to buy a home but can't qualify due to many different situations that they are faced with. I buy houses and either fix them up and sell them to people on contract or rent to own basis that don't have large sums of money for downpayments or I sell them to other investors that have the financial means to fix up the properties in low income areas to make the communities a better, safer place to live.

lenders.name: Davinder
lenders.loan_because: I can and we all should!
lenders.occupational_info: I help large companies manage their money and ensure that it is spent responsibly!

lenders.name: Grant
lenders.loan_because:
Kiva makes it so easy to do.  
I believe everyone should help everyone...

lenders.name: Landon
lenders.loan_because: I myself have received an enormous amount of help in my life, so I would like to help other people, too.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.occupational_info: I help people start home businesses.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: when a person has enough to meet their needs they should share

lenders.name: Cece
lenders.loan_because: This seems like a great way to make the quality of someone else's life better.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I belive in helping women so that they can educate their children and raise themselves out of poverty.

lenders.name: Stuart
lenders.loan_because: Give someone fish and you feed them for a day - Give a fishing net and you feed them for life - Loan them enough capital to start a fishing net manufacturing business, and you might create the chance for an entire community to prosper.

lenders.name: Teguh
lenders.loan_because: to help refugees in Bitung, North Celebes, Indonesia especially in fisheries,agricultrure and home industry sector
lenders.occupational_info: Training them to have entrepreuneur minded and make them more productive, so they can have a better life

lenders.name: Cait
lenders.occupational_info: I do computer work for a nongovernmental organization.

lenders.name: Ann and Fintan
lenders.loan_because: We love the idea of helping one person at a time achieve specific goals and better his or her life and the surrounding community.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: it's a small thing I can do that makes a tremendous difference to someone on the other side of the world that I'll never meet. I also loan because my partner grew up in difficult circumstances in a Third World Country and it's a way of giving back.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people improve their lives.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: Free enterprise works and everyone should have a fair chance to make it so.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist minority women to break the cycle of poverty and help them make a positive change in their communities
lenders.occupational_info: I style and stage homes so they become show ready and home buyers can move in mentally and therefore make an offer. A staged home generally sell faster and potentially for more. For more info and to see before and after photos of my staging & redesigns, go to www.staged4more.com

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: It's the best way to help people better themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an airline and work with the pilots to plan and prepare for their flights.

lenders.name: Elaina

lenders.name: Blair and Karen

lenders.name: Vincenzo

lenders.name: McKell
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 3rd grade.

lenders.name: Moa
lenders.loan_because: we are all one

lenders.name: Emma

lenders.name: sofia
lenders.loan_because: since i am totally blind myself, and often need help from others, i was happy to find a way of helping my self
lenders.occupational_info: music is a way of communicating that works for everybody. The people that i meet as a music therapist have big learning dissabilities and can't use spoken words, but they still have a lot to say and they need to say it. music is good for body and soul and can make you laugh and cry.

lenders.name: Ravi
lenders.loan_because:
Two serious students of Krishnamurti's teachings are looking for other

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: it give others the opportunity to build their businesses which in turn builds their confidence and their happiness. It also makes me feel good. It makes the world a better place to live in.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly big planes across big oceans!

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I think this is the best way to help people. I was a VSO volunteer and did a similar thing on a personal basis when I was working in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English in a local primary school in Hong Kong.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I love loaning again and again being able to help people all over the world. We are one people, one planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare material for print before it goes to press. We do posters, booklets, brochures, business cards, etc. The company I work for (Westcare) is a non-profit organisation that provides work and accommodation services for disabled people.

lenders.name: Sherma
lenders.loan_because:
I admire the courage it takes to start and run one's own business.  "If we did all the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astonish ourselves."  - Thomas A. Edison
PURPOSE: If I can help somebody, my living will not be in vain.

lenders.name: Lawrence & Family
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach economics - how to think and reason about buying, selling, and other market activities.

lenders.name: Dayngr
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is important to help empower people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses market their business to prospects through social media.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I just feel that this is the best way to suport a family or a person ,buddha says give to be given
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Chef by passion enjoy beeng in asia which is my home now .I share my passion and eductaion by teaching a craft

lenders.name: Taryn & Sam
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lenders.name: Emina
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone can make a difference.

lenders.name: antonio
lenders.loan_because: I care about poor people
lenders.occupational_info: As any other hard working Job

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: Empowering women to be sulf-sufficient will change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for a public arts conservatory for high school students.

lenders.name: Adamson family
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed and out of that I want others to be blessed by what we have and what we can give.  I love this idea!!  It feels great to be doing something so concrete and meaningful and to know I'm helping someone not so different from myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mom of 3 wonderful kids - Julia (3), Alex and Elijah (twins, 1).  I hope that the most important thing I do is to raise caring, compassionate, godly people.  I also teach math and science to 12 year olds.

lenders.name: Ed J.
lenders.loan_because: Backpacked around SE Asia for half a year, and saw lots of poverty and a poor perception of the USA. Since stereotypes break down on the individual level, I think the one to one micro-loans from real individuals in the USA to real individuals in other countries help relations.  A citizen of a country is automatically represented by their government on a macro scale, but Kiva gives an opportunity for citizens to represent the better side of themselves to each other one on one.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Julie A.
lenders.loan_because: It's a win-win situation. I help someone and my doing so helps them, me and the world.

lenders.name: Jack & Lora
lenders.loan_because: We want to assist others in their goals to earn decent livings for their families. Kiva is a part of our ongoing charity commitment. As the LORD blesses us, we want to bless others with our resources.

lenders.name: Stéphanie
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great initiative to help people directly.

lenders.name: Bill & Annette
lenders.loan_because: It makes us feel good and we may very well be judged by how we treat those less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: Teach art to 1st and 2nd grade students.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: It sounded awesome, and then Jill reminded me about the site again :)

lenders.name: Indy Cat-O
lenders.loan_because: I am a crazy cat!

lenders.name: sierra
lenders.loan_because: Because everyone deserves a chance

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I feel like the disparity between first world and third world countries is immoral.
lenders.occupational_info: A lab technician at Columbia University studying metacognition.  It's Amazing!

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: It is important to me to feel as though I am a helpful member of the worldwide community.  If I can provide someone a chance to prosper through hard work with as little as a $25.00 loan, how can I say no?
lenders.occupational_info: I work on transportation systems and public transit projects.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because:
This is one great way to plug in to the global community.
It's the right place and the right time to do the right thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a really cool design/build company, IIIAD (also a Kiva lender) doing what I love, creating beautiful sustainable homes for the best  clients in the Twin Cities.

lenders.name: Terry & Will
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help people help themselves.  We believe in the saying "Freely ye received, freely give."

lenders.name: maria
lenders.loan_because: we have to help each other in any way we can despite how far from each other we live
lenders.occupational_info:
I sell tiles for bathrooms,kitchens and also bathtubs ,sinks etc.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I should.

lenders.name: Kylie and Jesse
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we are so fortunate in our lives, and love the idea of helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: Susan

lenders.occupational_info: I create one of a kind collages and paintings.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because:
I like to see the less fortunate members of our world have a chance at realizing
their dreams and it just makes me feel good.

lenders.loan_because: I've seen my host mama in Tanzania be able to send both her children to school and improve her home with the loan she received for her brick business.
lenders.occupational_info: Graduate student pursuing an MPA.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: My compassion is to help others.  I tell my friends all about Kiva and try to spread the word about this great organization.

lenders.name: Jim & LJ
lenders.loan_because: we want to help people

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I'm thankful for the opportunities I have been given.   I want to to "pay it forward".
lenders.occupational_info: I help small employers set up retirement plans.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to see a change in this world, even if it is only through one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for political campaigns.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky enough to have friends and family assist me in starting a business So i wanted to pass that along.
lenders.occupational_info: I restore and sell  old cars.

lenders.name: Will and Edna
lenders.loan_because: our dad believed in the Kiva model and was proud to support those who wanted to work to improve their lives. In honor of Mom who passed away 29 Sept. 2007 and Dad who passed away 12 Mar. 2008, we will continue their Kiva account and hope to help lift many others the way our parents worked to lift themselves.

lenders.name: Jacob
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people!!!!!  I have been very blessed and want to pass it  on!!!!!!!!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a swimming coach at Penn State University 

www.psu.edu 
www.gopsusports.com 


WE ARE.....PENN STATE

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: The amount I'm lending has no impact on my life, but can have a huge impact on someone else's.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in Purchasing.  My company makes home theater projectors and displays, as well as other flat screen products.

lenders.name: Becca
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed.  I have food, clothing, shelter, wonderful family and friends.  I don't need to struggle to provide for my family the way some others may need to.  I loan because my little money may help others succeed in fulfilling their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I help women in childbirth.

lenders.name: Kris&Nadia
lenders.loan_because: Helping entrepreneurs get started can make the difference

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I love to help out and this is so easy!

lenders.name: Jenn, Claire and Dan
lenders.loan_because: i loan because to whom much is given, much is expected.

lenders.name: Zoey & Gracie
lenders.loan_because: We raise money every year on Canada Day, with a lemonade stand. This year we sold handmade bead jewelry too. With the money we made there and some matching donations (from some awesome relatives ) we wanted to help some other people in business for themselves. this year for my birthday instead of gifts i asked for donations to kiva on this request i received 110 dollars for kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: i am in grade 7

lenders.name: Tim and Anne
lenders.loan_because: To give someone else an opportunity.

lenders.name: DiamondJul
lenders.loan_because: it's fun and others deserve the same access to resources I have!  It is my way to pay forward the abundance I enjoy!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional network marketer.  I work with people as a leader and trainer in this profession.  I help individuals and families create abundance of their own!

lenders.name: Chloe
lenders.loan_because: giving others the means to help themselves is a wonderful thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I look at rocks and soil, I assess their situation and how they behave e.g. landslides and subsidence.  I then design solutions to allow projects such as house building, railways and roads.  I would be happy to volunteer help to charities who may need my skills.

lenders.name: Matteo&Emma
lenders.loan_because: Because it' s concrete way to change the world and to help many people. We need to have the same possibilities wherever we born.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a financial analyst in M&A operations.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: to affect the quality of one's day is the highest of arts (thoreau).

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies advertise on major search engines.

lenders.name: misty
lenders.loan_because: I am able.

lenders.name: Tera
lenders.loan_because: Local economies are the key to a country's success. During our year+ round-the-world trip, my husband and I felt the power of small business on the "feel" of a country.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with teachers and school leaders to help students be successful in mathematics.

lenders.name: Mike & Nay
lenders.loan_because: After watching a documentary about the work Kiva does My wife & I were really keen to get involved with helping others. We are looking forward to seeing many success stories.

lenders.name: Oliver
lenders.loan_because:
I like the idea of helping with money to build a business instead of just giving it away to a charitable whatever where I don't know what happens to it.
I hope my money will go around the world many times and help people start their businesses  and improve their lives and those of the generations that follow.
[Update] My plan seems to work and my money is helping lots of people again and again. VERY COOL THAT!
[Update] Already lent so much! How cool is that. I hope this is making some difference to someone.
[Update] For my 40th birthday I chose all presents to go to Kiva. Now I have a HELP CHEST with lots of $$ to do even more helping in the world!

Also bought a Yamaha TRX850 and love motorcycles so most of my lending is now towards people that use motorcycles or do transport stuff.
lenders.occupational_info: Self employed IT contractor.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity...pay it forward.

lenders.name: Ulf
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in the lenders development
lenders.occupational_info: writing about the reality that beats hope

lenders.name: AaronB
lenders.loan_because: I recognize that there is not a level playing field in the world and that I was born into a more advantageous position than many.  It is a small way for me to help give someone else an opportunity that they might not otherwise have.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: ... because I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people and small companies with legal troubles, in the areas of the Internet, Intellectual Property (copyright, trademark, patents), and free speech.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: When I showed me Kiva I was so eager to create an account so my dad and I quickly created a Kiva account. Once we were done creating a Kiva account I quickly started loaning  people money. Now I check my account about every week to see if anyvody paid back so that I can loan more people money. GO KIVA!
lenders.occupational_info: Well I mostly loan to people who are just starting so that they can have a fresh start. I also like to loan to people who are just about done. (for more information on my lending ways you can always send me a message) BYE!!!

lenders.name: Elizabeth and Billy
lenders.loan_because: We like the opportunity to give someone a chance to succeed and hopefully improve their communities.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: To participate in a small way  to help people who want a better life for themselves, their families and their neighbors. We all need a little help sometime in life. An opportunity to be a better global neighbor
lenders.occupational_info:
I  work for a company that provides medical equipment  primarily for the elderly,
My job is to work with caregivers  to see that patients get the proper equipment for their needs.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky to have someone to help me start my own company. I want to do the same for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a marketing company. We design brochures and advertisements, and we produce large live events.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: everybody deserves a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info:
The individuals requesting loans through Kiva are the personification of the entrepreneurial spirit that has made the United States the greatest nation in the world.  

I am glad to play a small role in helping others to achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.whereabouts: Tai Kok Tsui Kowloon  Hong Kong
lenders.loan_because: through Kiva I am experiencing just how interconnected we are and how small the world really is.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an English teacher at a vocational college (post secondary school). I think that my students teach me, their teacher, more than I do them.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I want people to have a chance to help in their own community and succeed without paying too high a price.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel and meet many people like the people Kiva are helping, I enjoy my work and want to help others to enjoy their's.

lenders.name: Vivek & Bhavana
lenders.loan_because: Capialism  - The richest get loans at very low interest rates as their credit history is good and credit risk is very low. The poor on the other hand are the not eligible for loans, or are charged very high interest rates. This vicious cycle needs to be broken, and the more fortunate should break the system and let the less fortunate come out of the poverty trap. We should just think about the impact that our loans can have on each of the families that we try and support.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently working with a hedge fund as an analyst, mainly looking at asian equities.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to shape their own life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a college student, currently studying Arabic and international studies.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I meet people from many 3rd world countries at my job, they are very hard working brothers that just need  a chance.  I feel that sharing what you have can only help you.
lenders.occupational_info: NYC taxi garage--- work with many people from the same countries as people getting loans on this site.  I like to think that I could be helping a friend/relative of someone who works with me.

lenders.name: Nathan Moore
lenders.loan_because: I believe capitalism with good morals is the best path to a better world.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: Sharing with others is a human need. It keeps us grounded with our neighbors around the world, and, hopefully, will leave the world a better place than we found it.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: Jesus calls us as imitators of Christ to aid the tired, weary, weak, and poor.  I give because He gave first.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop computer software that companies use to streamline business and save money.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I have been privileged enough to be going to the best school in the country and I have so many opportunities that others don't have, I would rather forgo a daily cup of coffee and help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I study Africa and volunteer around the world when I can.

lenders.name: sarah
lenders.loan_because: I have to start a project called Sahakaar for the 50 slum women to empower them through income generation activities and micro credits. This project will be self-supportive and after the repayment of Loan the profit will be used to start more Sahakaar groups. Instead of I waiting  for funds I would prefer to take loan and repay.
lenders.occupational_info: Sahakaar group is a group of 10 women working together taking micro credits and manufacture different products. These women are also provided education every day 1 hour after their work.

lenders.name: Donna & Sandy
lenders.loan_because: We believe that it is the right thing to do - to help out others in need. It is such a small thing that can make such a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: We live in a small town in Southern Saskatchewan, Canada. We have a moderate sized grain farm. Our family consists of 3 boys, 1 girl and 2 cats.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: i know this website from the tv, and it's really really useful that can help lots of people over the world.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Because it’s the least i can do

lenders.name: Larry & Cathy
lenders.loan_because: We are both self-employed and understand the challenges and benefits of starting and maintaining a small enterprise

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: To help others to be able to care for their families by making a living.  Making the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide office support to others while caring for my 4 children (ages 11, 7, 5 and  20 months)

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: Anything that could help a family  to live with dignity is worth helping.
lenders.occupational_info: It is a combination of system support, troubleshooting, logistics and planning. It is an overwhelming job actually.

lenders.name: Faruk
lenders.loan_because: Help children for education. Three most important things are essential to win against poverty - 1. Education 2. Education and 3. Education
lenders.occupational_info: IT Specialist

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I want to give a helping hand.

lenders.name: Deepak
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to raise a loan for such a high interest rate. It make me feel good to help who are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Electrical Items distributor like Switchgear,Control gear products used in Electrical panels

lenders.name: David John
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the entrepreneurial spirit within a country with economic freedom can raise the world's standard of living.
lenders.occupational_info: Comprehensive wealth management is based on the principle that small changes can have large effects over time.

lenders.name: kagoda
lenders.occupation: STUDENT WHO HAS TWO YEARS TO COMPLETE COURSE

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I want to support the entrepreneurial spirit and help those who are willing to work hard and take risks.
lenders.occupational_info: I helped men and women think through the process of starting and growing their own small business, how to plan, market, finance, maintain records, etc.

lenders.name: Kellie
lenders.loan_because: its the right thing to do. Helping someone to  enhance there life is the best gift of all.

lenders.name: Moïra
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who are able to run their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English and French in a high school.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: To enable people to work and feed themselves
lenders.occupational_info: Achieve targets

lenders.name: Leann
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of my help making it possible for someone to create something positive and change their lives, and their communities.  Although I live in the over-privileged America, I recognize  money is NOT what makes the world go 'round.  It's people and their dreams, and I like knowing I can help make a difference and do something important.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to change the world for the betterment of all mankind.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a film director.

lenders.name: Sondra and Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I understand that some people just need a little help to get things going. It's nice to be able to reach out to those motivated people who are trying to make their lives better.

lenders.name: Henrik Melander
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help foreign entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: Works with computers to design and create telecom software.

lenders.name: AMANDA
lenders.occupation: Member Services Representative for Credit Union

lenders.name: Kwali Media and Associates
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do, whilst keeping others in mind, that have less. We are lucky people
lenders.occupational_info: Kwali Media and Associates record audio for film and television. We edit and produce music for media use.

lenders.name: Kari
lenders.loan_because: I want my 2 sons to learn the importance of small family businesses, and how they are the cornerstones of all communities around the world. We hope that our contributions are welcomed and smartly invested.
lenders.occupational_info: Business consultant for overseas companies requiring sales and marketing related help in North-America.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can make a difference.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: Helping these people to earn a living and connecting with other people in the world is a better return than I can get anywhere else.

lenders.name: Encounter Service Camp
lenders.loan_because: Encounter the Gospel of Life is a youth service camp that desires to reach out and connect with our global community.  We work with high school youth from the Washington DC, Baltimore, Boston, New York and Pennsylvania areas and strive to work with them and show them how they can also connect with people around the world through micro loans.
lenders.occupational_info:
EGL is a Catholic Service Camp.

To learn more about us, visit our website or follow us on facebook (Encounter Service Camp):

www.eglweb.org

lenders.name: Eldo
lenders.loan_because: I believe we must all help each other.  I came to this country as an immigrant and with hard work and the help of many loving people, I learned the language and became a successful businessman.
lenders.occupational_info: I work part time as I am retired and I love to cook and spend time with friends and Italian cultural organizations.  I especially love being with my family.

lenders.name: Nicky & Ramon
lenders.loan_because: We loan because the Kiva Project makes sense. We don't have much money but are willing to share with people who have less.
lenders.occupational_info: Nicky produces and edits video programs. I'm a retired, disabled cartoonist -- can't draw anymore, so I write Micro fiction (under 500 words) stories.

lenders.name: Lee and Sharon
lenders.loan_because: Because we can and should!!

lenders.name: P & S
lenders.loan_because: it is a no brainer.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people!
lenders.occupational_info: Music and movements

lenders.name: Troutsfarm
lenders.loan_because: We can.

lenders.name: Shellie
lenders.loan_because:
* It feels good
* I'm grateful to have the opportunity to share
* It's easy (thanks Kiva!)
lenders.occupational_info: I love to travel and meet new people.  Travel is the best way to remember that 'we are all one', and we all ultimately want the same things:  food, water, shelter, love, joy.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I like being able to help others become self-sufficient, and in turn help their families and communities.

lenders.name: Brooks
lenders.loan_because: i know i can make a difference and have been given so much.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: it helps make the world a better place....
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a Geotechnical Consulting firm in No. California.

lenders.name: Camille
lenders.loan_because: all the cool kids are doing it.
lenders.occupational_info: I send marketing emails about skin products.

lenders.name: Charlie
lenders.loan_because: To offset an unjust and unequal system which benefits from keeping people impoverished, I am happy to contribute to the growth and financial maturing of the developing world. It is a way to equalize and reform capitalism without dismantling it, which I believe is the best approach to helping people build wealth. It’s a subversive and direct yet delicate approach to creating a world where opportunity is not reserved for those born into it.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 6th grade student who plays soccer.

lenders.name: Eulalia
lenders.loan_because: We have so much here in the U.S. - everyone ought to realize how lucky they are and give to someone who's less fortunate and trying to improve their lives!
lenders.occupational_info: I write website content, brochures, and marketing materials for small to medium sized businesses.

lenders.name: Alexander

lenders.occupational_info: I mostly grow vegetables from seeds I get from Italy. I do it because its different and challenges my ability.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of being able to lend money that doesn't just feed a person or family for a day but sets them up for a lifetime of supporting themselves.

lenders.name: Chris

lenders.name: carlos
lenders.occupational_info: ingeniero ambiental.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: Helping eachother is the right thing to do.  I hope my kids will learn it's not what you have but what you give.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an internet entreprenuer. I buy at yard sales and sell my finds on the internet.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: There are many who have the drive to be successful and self-sufficient but they just need a helping hand at the start.

lenders.name: Lily
lenders.loan_because: it's a way for a young person to do something helpful in the world.

lenders.name: ocean lover
lenders.loan_because: This is something that I can do in MY income bracket!

lenders.name: Barbara

lenders.name: John and Shannon

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate. God has blessed me so much in my own life.
lenders.occupational_info: My company makes blogs - personal websites that can be easily updated. This allows people to share their stories and views with others and connect to people.

lenders.name: Brian

lenders.loan_because: .....I can.

lenders.occupational_info: I am training to be a counseling psychologist, which is a person who spends time listening and talking with others about difficulties in their lives, and attempts to encourage them about the present and the future

lenders.loan_because: We must help others in need; very little can go very far.

lenders.name: Dan and Laura

lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world.

lenders.loan_because: i don't see a reason not to

lenders.occupational_info: I do not have a job other than to go to school and do chores.

lenders.name: Linh
lenders.loan_because: It's a good thing.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: My work is based on commerce around the world, so in a way I am helping both me and the person I loan to.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to make the most of their personal finances

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because:
As I can, how could I not?

KIVA offers me a fantastic way to directly assist persons for whom a little can mean a lot. Still, there is a need for other kinds of support as well (e.g. humanitarian efforts, infrastructure), but this is a fantastic way to help alleviate poverty. And I so admire the entreprenurial spirit! Thank you Kiva for making it possible for me to do my bit in such an easy manner!

Just think about what the world would look like if everybody paid it forward, e.g. via Kiva.

lenders.name: Tamerlane
lenders.loan_because: I'm fascinated by the whole process, and I would like to make a modest difference to global well-being.

lenders.occupational_info: I forecast trends in technology and society.  Based on my view of the future, I make bets on the most talented and well-qualified people that will insure a successful tomorrow.

lenders.loan_because: i loan out because i belive in giving the more you give the more you loan out god will continue providing for me, i want many people on this site to know that if they have any problem am ready to give, my husband his dead and me, my self am sufering from cancer of the breast  i have close to $8,000,000 in my bank account but i have no children to  inherit the money, thats why i want to used the money to help other people and the orphange.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a  medical doctor in my country  and a par time contractor i eanr nothing less than $100,000 every month.

Thuy died April 15, 2014 of advanced Heart Disease at the age of 44 years old.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: These smiles of hope, are all I need to know that the little that I am doing is going to help them change their own lives.

lenders.name: Mario

lenders.name: Jordan

lenders.name: ROCKY

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the entrepreneurial spirit and am confident that with dedication, persistence, and a little luck my seed money can help needy individuals succeed in their business endeavors.

lenders.name: Kw33n
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves so that they may improve their lives and those of their families.  I especially want to assist women in finding financial independence so they are not subjected to lives of violence - emotional, physical and sexual abuse.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: I am a woman, a wife, a mother, a sister.

lenders.name: O J

lenders.name: Curt

lenders.occupational_info: I began as a Minnesota farmboy and retired from large international company where I developed new business in packaging products.  I now get great satisfaction from volunteering to help others in many ways.  I help fix broken things!

lenders.name: Amy
